docs.text: Yulai Xie PhD, Chief Researcher @ Hitachi China Research Lab. Information (last update: 2023.11) Visit my GitHub Visit my ResearchGate Research Area Machine learning Computer vision Crowd simulation Traffic analysis Multi modal analysis AIGC Education 2004-2010 Bachelor and Master (engineering) @ Tianjin Univ., China 2010-2014 Ph.D (engineering) @ Hokkaido Univ. with CSC scholarship, Japan Experience 2014- Hitachi China Research Laboratory Publications Xie, Yulai, Jingjing Niu, Yang Zhang, and Fang Ren. “Global-Shared Text Representation Based Multi-Stage Fusion Transformer Network for Multi-Modal Dense Video Captioning.” IEEE Transactions on Multimedia , August 23, 2023. https://doi.org/10.1109/TMM.2023.3307972 . Wang, Xiaohui, Yulai Xie, Yang ZHANG, Xiaoning Pi, and Fang Ren. “Digital Simulation-Based Data Generation for Quality Inspection.” In ICCMS 2023 , 6. 2023. https://doi.org/10.1145/3608251.3608291 Han, Zhenyu, Siran Ma, Changzheng Gao, Erzhuo Shao, Yulai Xie, Yang Zhang, Lu Geng, and Yong Li. “Disease Simulation in Airport Scenario Based on Individual Mobility Model.” ACM Transactions on Intelligent Systems and Technology , May 20, 2023. https://doi.org/10.1145/3593589 陈卫星,谢雨来, 基于时空逻辑的高空作业违规检测方法研究. 机电安全 , 2023年6月 Zhang, Yanfei, Yulai Xie, Yang Zhang, Yiruo Dai, and Fang Ren. “VSSum: A Virtual Surveillance Dataset for Video Summary.” In ICCCV 2022 , 7, 2022. https://doi.org/10.1145/3561613.3561631 Yulai Xie, Jingjing Niu, Yang Zhang, and Fang Ren. "Multisize Patched Spatial-Temporal Transformer Network for Short-and Long-Term Crowd Flow Prediction", IEEE Transactions on Intelligent Transportation Systems , 2022. http://dx.doi.org/10.1109/TITS.2022.3186707 Jingjing Niu, Yulai Xie(Co-first author), Yang Zhang, and Fang Ren. “Tri-Modal Dense Video Captioning Based on Fine-Grained Aligned Text and Anchor-Free Event Proposals Generator” International Journal of Pattern Recognition and Artificial Intelligence , 2022. https://doi.org/10.1142/S021800142255014X Shao, Erzhuo, Zhenyu Han, Yulai Xie, Yang Zhang, Lu Geng, and Yong Li. “Interior Individual Trajectory Simulation with Population Distribution Constraint,” ACM Transactions on Intelligent Systems and Technology , 2022. https://doi.org/10.1145/3529108 Xie, Yulai, Yang Zhang, and Fang Ren. “Temporal-Aware Graph Convolution Network for Skeleton-Based Action Recognition.” ACM International Conference Proceeding Series , 2021, 83–90. https://doi.org/10.1145/3484274.3484288 . Xie, Yulai, Yang Zhang, and Fang Ren. “Temporal-Enhanced Graph Convolution Network for Skeleton-Based Action Recognition.” IET Comput.Vis. , 2022, 266–79. https://doi.org/10.1049/cvi2.12086 . Fan, Xiaojie, Fang Ren, Yulai Xie, Yiying Zhang, Jingjing Niu, Jingyu Zhang, and Jianping Wang. “Mitigating Ambiguity by Deep-Learning-Based Modal Decomposition Method.” Optics Communications ,September 2020, https://doi.org/10.1016/j.optcom.2020.125845 Fan, Xiaojie, Lina Wang, Fang Ren, Yulai Xie, Xiang Lu, Yiying Zhang, Tianwen Zhangsun, Wei Chen, and Jianping Wang. “Feature Fusion-Based Multi-Task ConvNet for Simultaneous Optical Performance Monitoring and Bit-Rate/Modulation Format Identification.” IEEE Access PP (September 2, 2019): 1–1. https://doi.org/10.1109/ACCESS.2019.2939043 Fan, Xiaojie, Yulai Xie, Fang Ren, Yiying Zhang, Xiaoshan Huang, Wei Chen, Tianwen Zhangsun, and Jianping Wang. “Joint Optical Performance Monitoring and Modulation Format/Bit-Rate Identification by CNN-Based Multi-Task Learning.” IEEE Photonics Journal 10 (September 11, 2018): 1–1. https://doi.org/10.1109/JPHOT.2018.2869972 Liu, Guojin, Zhenzhi Yin, Yunjian Jia, and Yulai Xie. “Passenger Flow Estimation Based on Convolutional Neural Network in Public Transportation System.” Knowledge-Based Systems 123 (February 1, 2017). https://doi.org/10.1016/j.knosys.2017.02.016 . Xie, Yulai, Satoshi Kanai, and Hiroaki Date. “An Efficient Simulation of Skin Contact Deformation for Virtual Ergonomic Assessments of Handheld Products.” International Journal of CAD/CAM 13 (January 1, 2013): 81–95. Xie, Yulai, Satoshi Kanai, and Hiroaki Date. “Anatomy-Based Variational Modeling of Digital Hand and Its Verification.” In DHM/HCII 2013 , 8026:384–92, 2013. https://doi.org/10.1007/978-3-642-39182-8_45 .
